thread.title: Merkel secures fourth term with coalition deal

title: Merkel secures fourth term with coalition deal
text:
Merkel secures fourth term with coalition deal 1:52am EST - 01:53 
Members of Germany's Social Democrats (SPD) voted in favor of a coalition with Chancellor Angela Merkel's conservatives on Sunday, opening the way to a new government for Europe's largest economy. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Members of Germany's Social Democrats (SPD) voted in favor of a coalition with Chancellor Angela Merkel's conservatives on Sunday, opening the way to a new government for Europe's largest economy.
